name: alfa-video
description: Remotion video for ALFA Smart Document Matcher project

scripts.build: remotion render AlfaVideoRU out/alfa-video-ru.mp4 && remotion render AlfaVideoEN out/alfa-video-en.mp4
scripts.build:apree: remotion render ApreeVideoRU out/apree-video-ru.mp4 && remotion render ApreeVideoEN out/apree-video-en.mp4
